person.persName: Richard Druin (Green County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of George W. Druin and Celia Druin. Attended school in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Green County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 31, 1861, to February 1, 1865.
